website_summaries.verdict: The franchise returns with even more gratuitous violence and grimy perversions of the American dream. All this adds up to the best GTA yet, in every way possible.  Smash, steal, and shoot your way through what could be the biggest open-world game ever.  The gripping narrative will keep you on the edge of your seat or feel free to spend countless hours doing whatever the hell you want to—to whoever the hell you want.
pros: Lets you switch between the three major characters on the fly
cons: iFruit app not available on Android at launch
Online servers slow or inaccessible during test period

customer_reviews.title: Still high quality on PS3
customer_reviews.text: Still packs a punch this game even on the PS3. More than holds its own on this system. All the game play and exploring is there. Sure there are graphical enhancements on the current gen systems, but that’s just icing on what is already, a darned fine cake. Highly recommended this version if you just have a PS3 and haven’t got it already. An all time classic! 😀👍
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Jenkin - njenkin

customer_reviews.title: GTA V
customer_reviews.text: Enhanced graphics make Los Santos more immersive, Vast amounts to see, do and explore, Killer combo of mouse and first-person view Superb video capture and editing features. Fantastic all-round game. Rockstar expands the story from one central character, but three individuals, each with their own personality and perspective. The player can switch between characters on the fly. This makes for some interesting situations, such as sending yourself to go help yourself when you're in a bind. Or, my personal favorite: driving two characters directly towards each other and switching back and forth until the inevitable loss of control takes place. I take a bizarre amount of glee watching my "other" body fly through the windshield in front of me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever !
customer_reviews.text: Great game, I love its storyline and I've been a GTA fan for many a year (as a 40 year old woman you would've thought Id grow out of videogames, but I couldn't resist, as soon as I purchased a PS3 for my son this was the first game on my shopping list. It's an 18 for a reason, so those who are easily offended I suggest you look at another beige title !). I love nothing more than jumping in a car, listening to the radio (great soundtrack yet again) and going out causing random acts of craziness just for a laugh lol !
customer_reviews.author: Shell G

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable Experience, multiplayer stable and improving
customer_reviews.text: Pros:- Great come back from the awkward controls of IV, feels much more playable. Gunfights are smooth with almost Gears of War fluidity to taking cover, voice acting is first class, highly recommend to play with with headphones and without subtitles for the movie-like experience. Online multiplayer is good fun, especially with friends. Cons:- The LOOOONG loading times are almost Resident Evil 1 frustrating, there is only so much patience one can spend looking at the loading screen pictures. Once you max out all the skills (which actually doesn't take that long), there is little incentive to keep grinding away. Even the new missions unlocked at higher levels feel repetitive.
customer_reviews.author: Hadouken

customer_reviews.title: A must have: love the game, love the music.
customer_reviews.text: Great play! A must have. Addictive and very well done. In the end, after spending hours with them, you will like all the 3 characters...even the fourth one: your on-line avatar. Cause this game is great on single mode, long missions, great music on the radio, amazing game play and scenery, but it's amazing even online, where you can interact with players all around the world and create a crew of friends to enjoy it even more.
customer_reviews.author: gina's mom

customer_reviews.title: Ok game
customer_reviews.text: GTA 5 is fun and great for when the boredom hits...but after a while the game also gets boring. If your considering the game for PS3, and expecting to go online and verse other players, i say dont waste your money! Its full of hackers
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cycling to
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cycling to. - Ideally on a stationary exercise bike, although if you are able to facilitate playing on a more mobile bike and are prepared to accept the risks entailed then this experience may further enhance the experience. The characters are foul mouthed - which is refreshing in a age where so many games try to shelter innocent minds from such vulgar and repulsive behaviour. Not for children - they should not be cycling at their age. They should be outside playing. I recommend buying Trevor a suit. The views are delightful and the scenery exquisite.
customer_reviews.author: your dad

customer_reviews.title: V out of V
customer_reviews.text: I love the GTA series, and V is a cut above the rest, for so many reasons. The ability to play as three separate characters adds so much more breadth to the story and gameplay, and the game itself looks and plays like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Weatherwax

customer_reviews.title: Totally Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: GTA 5 is without doubt thee most anticipated game in years and oh... how it has been worth the anticipation i can tell you. Its the best game I've played on ps3 its just so addictive and involving I don't think there is anything i do not like about this game it just has everything! and is all i do all weekend since its release haha, even my gf and daughter like watching me play it which is great because i don't get moaned at to turn it off for a while like with other games haha. anyway the other reviews say it all really.... could possibly be the best ever ps3 game (even PlayStation game) of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Boyall

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the wait - amazing
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. Buy!! It was a long wait from GTA IV until GTA V, but once you play the game, you can see why. You are totally and completely immersed in the world of GTA. Additionally, they have corrected the weird driving experience of GTA IV, to almost realistic extents. Note, that the adult them now longer covers game play, but also the cut scenes. The storyline surpasses most of the Hollywood Movies around. There is virtually nothing that you cannot do in this world, plus internet gaming part of the game is pretty unique, and will keep you busy longer after you have completed the game.
customer_reviews.author: Sukhster

customer_reviews.title: Who wouldn't give this a 5 star rating?
customer_reviews.text: An idiot, that's who! Fans of the GTA series won't even be reading the reviews, and I'm sure if you are you're either a concerned parent or someone who's never played it before. Let me start with the fact that it's an epic game with a large map that took me half hour to get to the other side last night (not including the multiple stops to help people out). It's the same as always, guns, gangsters and in-depth stories, (lots of the 'n' word as well, cheers Franklin) There's a reason it's an 18, much more of a reason because of Trevor. But you can use your discretion.
customer_reviews.author: Silk

customer_reviews.title: Best PS3 game ever?
customer_reviews.text: Probably! There is so much to do, I've completed the game twice and already playing a third time, trying to get 100% in everything. The only let down is perhaps the music, could have been better and more of it. The hip hop and funk stations are good, but again there are only about 15 songs on each one and after a while it gets boring. If ONLY Rockstar had given the option for a custom radio station (using PS3 music) then it would be perfect. But still, probably the best GTA game since San Andreas (hard to beat other than graphics!!!) and definitely one of the best on PS3 to date.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Swain

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: There is so much to do, and so much fun. It as to be one of the best PS3 game's i have ever played. So hard to put down, there are many reasons why it is not for kids. But for 18s plus u can't go wrong. I only wished i got it when it first came out. The story and most of all the online play is brilliant. If u like your cars you will love it. there are some great cars in the game. Plus choppers, motor bikes of all kinds plus bmx's, boats jet skye. 5stars is not enough. Plus it as now got cheaper so buy it as soon as u can. Highly Recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game, let down slightly by over the top violence
customer_reviews.text: I was one of the first people to get hold of GTA1 when it came out on PS1 and PC back in 1997. I remember thinking that GTA3 wouldn't be good due to 3D graphics too. How wrong I was. GTA5 is the best version in the GTA series. The city is absolutely amazing and breath taking. So much work has gone into this game. One negative about the game is that I think the violence is going over the top now. I didn't like Trevor in the game. I thought he was disgusting. If it wasn't for Trevor, I'd have given this game 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: crazyoz.com

customer_reviews.title: History is Made
customer_reviews.text: A game that is one for the history books. When growing up playing textris on gameboy I could of imagined a open word sandbox experience, but it would of been flat in comparison to what this jem of a game gives us. Not much more to say than this is a top shooter, driver, diver, maniac inducing (you will want to kill everything) wonder of a creation. cant wait to see what the next big thing to come out from the GTA world will be. Well done to all the people at Rockstar (even the online section). Another few months getting square eyes playing this game. I hope.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: The Franchise continues to Deliver
customer_reviews.text: Not Much need to Explain the Success of the Franchise but it's clear to say that this game follows & Exceeds the previous games in every sense. It doesn't ultimately match up to the hype set for it but no game will in a franchise like that. Constant Updates provide the game with a freshness rarely found in games & certainly a worthwhile purchase (If you aren't thinking of purchasing a next gen console atleast - Or in which case, just purchase it on that)
customer_reviews.author: LDSAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The reviews all said it was awesome, but I was skeptical... But it is awesome. The size of the map is incredible, as is the level of detail. The graphics are good too (in full HD too), as is the 5.1 surround sound (though it could be better). The missions (so far) are engaging though some of the optional ones are quite hard. This is clearly going to keep my entertained for some time! Even once I finish the missions there's clearly going to be loads left to discover.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GTA 5
customer_reviews.text: I can't give the game a complete review as I've only dipped in and out of it - I've no doubt that I'll be playing it in a years time and still haven't found everything and for me that's its seller - the ambition of Rockstar to create the biggest virtual world that you could get on the last generation of consoles has been realised, and to do that without squandering on things like graphics or story is simply amazing to me. I would say to most, this is a worthy buy for no doubt you will be getting your moneys worth!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Southgate

customer_reviews.title: Solid game all round.
customer_reviews.text: Gameplay is really well ironed, fun and addictive. 8/10 Graphic are absolutely stunning, next generation game, before the next generation consoles 10/10 Story is a bit cliché but still very playable and thoroughly enjoyable 8/10 Online multiplayer is still in the starting stages but everything taken into account with rockstar and all the troubles they have had they haver really landed on their feet here 8/10 All in all its an amazing game, really balanced all round, definitely worth £30 8/10
customer_reviews.author: CameraHobbit

customer_reviews.title: GTA = Fun, Fun, FUN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great value for money, there's so much to do and see in Los Santos. The one player mode has you swapping between the three main characters Michael, Franklin and Trevor, They each have solo missions and joint missions which are epic. The heists are really well done, you prepare well in advance on how your going attempt to steel the loot, you then have to put together your crew and go to work putting your plans into place. You really can't go wrong with this game, Rockstar have created a Masterpiece. Well worth the price of admission........... Oh yeah, the multiplayer is excellent to.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: This game is great except for the fact that the graphics are better ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is great except for the fact that the graphics are better on the Xbox 360 version > but the xbox one version is better than that > but the PS4 version is better than that > but the PC version is better than that. SO WHY NOT BUY ALL OFF THEM?
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great Game - Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few years ago and they still have new content coming out to this day. Really get your moneys worth when it comes to Rockstar
customer_reviews.author: Shoaib Khan

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: By now, we have all seen the previews, the record hit sales and profits and the TV adverts. from the screenshots and the trailers Rockstar teased us with for the past year really do live up to the expectations we had and assumed the game would be like. The graphics and the movements are amazing, but most of all, the story line was the best thing about the game. You should get this no matter what, and if you still aren't sure, just see a gameplay video on YT and I promise you'll change your mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: This game is life.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes i just go for a cruise. Literally switch on my playstation just to drive around on GTAV listening to the radio in my stolen ride. Occasionally hitting up Ponsonbury's and that swanky hairdressers for a new look. Is that sad? I don't care. Been playing GTA since it was aerial view. Who would have thought it would become what it is today?! absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: GTA BEST GAME EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have played all the GTA's since the first one and by far Rockstar have excelled at every title I have now upgraded to the PS4 version and love it just as much I will continue buying GTA titles until I forget how to play them. Story lines and plots are great and online mode is just off the hook never have I been so ingrossed in a game than this one
customer_reviews.author: daniel gardner

customer_reviews.title: WOW, best game I have ever played !
customer_reviews.text: What can I say ? It is just amazing. The amount of car, of land, of everything is amazing ! I know many people are saying that single player is a bit boring, but I really like collecting cars, customizing them, looking for stunt-jumps, redoing the missions,... And then there is GTA online ! Doing everything and anything with your friends in Los Santos is so fun ! A must buy for me, never had so much fun on an electronic object ! :-D A+++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Bifferling

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant game
customer_reviews.text: Quite literally this is the only game I have played for about three months now it is great fun playing with my friends on it I drive cars crash planes run over old ladies , Punch people on phones buy cars and do mission there could be a few more missions and stuff but it is a vary large and wide variety game next time they should put the whole of san andreas or make a totally new location but otherwise it is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Cubby Kovu

customer_reviews.title: It's GTA
customer_reviews.text: That's all there is to say really, but I need to write more stuff. Single player is great, Multiplayer is....ok (most of the time it's kill or be killed, no opportunity to actually team up and do heists/races/etc.). There's probably a million reviews for this so I don't expect this to be read, but if someone does, um, blah blah buy this game etc. p.s. you're awesome because you read all of this half-baked review rather than scrolling past it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

customer_reviews.title: Great GTA game
customer_reviews.text: Huge, fun, beautiful and violent are the first words that pop in my head when I think of GTA 5. The game loses 1 star for me because of the online part of the game (too many disconnection problems and issues to join your friends). Personally, I would have preferred that there is no online part at all! One more thing: the game is intended for adults (18+) and more precisely for people who can make a distinction between a game and the real life.
customer_reviews.author: Did in Belgium

customer_reviews.title: Try it, its a game consoles were made for!
customer_reviews.text: Having loved San Andreas I have to say this is a great game. Graphically it is superb and flows very smoothly and realistically. Great game for seasoned console players but NOT for kids, far to graphic and violent! Hilarious adult humour throughout much of the gameplay (especially the TV adverts on televisions in safe houses!) The free roaming and side line missions are a great distraction to carrying out the main missions. Main missions make up a great story following three main characters who lead a very varied but clashing lifestyle which has something for every type of player. Still only a short way into the game hence the fairly vague review.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Smiles on my face :)
customer_reviews.text: Great game, I’ve liked it as a child and bought to relive. Didn’t disappoint! You wont be either
customer_reviews.author: Rob johns

customer_reviews.title: Finally after the delayed launch...
customer_reviews.text: Finally glad to get my hands on this after the initial delayed launch and being out of stock every where once finally released. I got the item next day after ordering. Started with the missions and enjoying it Reason for the 4 Stars is... 1. A bit buggy, where the road disappears or i'm stuck in a wall 2. Online Play... Servers are no good atm Other than that, its a great game
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best Games You Will Ever Play
customer_reviews.text: GTA has never been so successful with over a year to wait for its release everyone was expecting huge things from this game and the day of its arrival I got it delivered. It is truly one of the best games I have ever played. With a storyline that twists and turns as you play the game creating missions by the certain acts you do in the game its got to be the most advanced game of its generation. I would recommend this game to literally anyone (as long as they were of course over eighteen years of age).
customer_reviews.author: Sean Geraghty

customer_reviews.title: ticked all the boxes
customer_reviews.text: The recipient was very happy with this item and seems to find it very addictive! The game was ordered before it was released and my son was very happy that it arrived on the day of release, without him having to queue all night at a local game shop,!!! It seems so simple? why do people make a trip to the high street at midnight to ensure getting a copy, when ordering on Amazon ensures your game will arrive on time!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley-Kent

customer_reviews.title: A new era...
customer_reviews.text: This game has so many games within this one game it is almost a steal that you get it for one price. From the mini adventures to the online gaming, this game is simply put a work of art. The characters are all great in their own respective way and working with them all is enjoyable and not at all off putting as I had feared when first hearing of three characters. The story line flows and one of the few games where you can enjoy it over and over again. Astonishing and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great continuation of GTA. Improved all areas of the game but still recognisable as GTA and same feel as the others. Only things people may not like (personal preference really though) having to switch between characters for the first time rather than following the journey of just one guy. However i think the story is interlinked enough to keep this a good new feature so the characters don't seem like its 3 different games in one. The only thing i don't always like are the (in my opinion) sometimes overly long cinematic footage bits before missions begin, they sometimes seem to go on a bit too long when you just want the mission to start
customer_reviews.author: ID4

customer_reviews.title: Possibly my favorite game
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say, this is a fantastic game. Get it or you'll regret it. Online is great with friends. Campaign has something for everyone, and everything for someone like me. Takes the gun mechanics from red dead, and a welcome balance of arcade and realistic driving mechanics; that was missing from anything after san-andreas (I'm sure there's an amusing anecdote in there somewhere).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look / feel that much different to previous GTA games but it's gameplay is fantastic and that's what really counts. Trevor is the best character in my opinion but Michael and Franklin are good / funny to play as. I know it's an 18 rated game but can't help but think that there will be 1000's of young kids who have got the game and have been exposed to the language but that's just me getting old!
customer_reviews.author: D. SO

customer_reviews.title: Great great action game
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic gaming experience enjoyed every minute playing with each level and mission better than the last the story and characters were incredible as was the new vehicles and weapons and the graphics out of this world fantastic experience met all my expectations and more many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: mike twain

customer_reviews.title: As good as always and Trevor has to be THE best ...
customer_reviews.text: Hadnt played it for years and then re-purposed the PS3 under the TV as we weren't watching Blue rays any more and was looking to play less poker. As good as always and Trevor has to be THE best video-game character EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Back to the good old days - San Andreas style
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully for me the gloom and depression of gta4 is long forgotten and gta5 takes us to a sprawling playground where fun is the only option, hey I've just ridden a roller coaster. I have only done a couple of missions so far and all my day has been taken up by just driving and opening up the map, trying different vehicles and getting into places frankly vehicles should not be! It's quality through and through. Welcome back gta
customer_reviews.author: Voituer

customer_reviews.title: Keep it simple
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll just keep it simple, I've had the game for a few weeks now and it is a really good game. So much to do, little side quests just to keep the game interesting, different plots to a mission when you fail it to many times. And it has an incredible Online feature. If you have played any of the other GTA's you definitely will not regret buying this game. Truly a masterpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Much anticipated game release that definitely lived up to its expectations. I love RockStar overall as their games are easy to play and master and are highly immersive with hours and hours of game-play. GTAV is no exception in that respect. However this time around they have added many more whistles and bells to the game play. Definitely a game for the adult player that simply does not fail. Great game.
customer_reviews.author: GalaxianX

customer_reviews.title: A great present
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my boyfriend, he absolutely loves it! I have watched him play it several times and it looks great fun. The graphics look great and the story line is very funny. It's clever how you can swap between the three main characters, especially as they go and do their own thing when you are not playing them. It can make for some amusing situations when you zoom back to them.
customer_reviews.author: dragonlance

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how quickly I got to the 95% mark. By then I'd lost interest in making it to 100% as it dawned on me that there wasn't much left to do. In the storyline, you have the ability to gain gang member experience. At that time, I thought that this would be something to follow on with after the end credits, but as far as I can tell this isn't possible. I think my main problem is that I was enjoying the game so much, that I was really let down when it ran out of steam.
customer_reviews.author: Riff1957

customer_reviews.title: GT5
customer_reviews.text: If you like previous Gta games then this is a pointless bit of text really, more violence and satire in the same vein with some amazing graphics on display. Really enjoyed playing through the campaign/story mode but im a gaming dinosaur and cant really get into online games so I cant comment on that side of the game although friends say it is now much improved and great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to install on my PS3 but played the game and am satisfied with it. I take it it doesn't look as nice as on PS4 or have as much content but I only wanted the base game itself, anyway. :)
customer_reviews.author: Felipe M.

customer_reviews.title: Best game I have ever played
customer_reviews.text: GTA has always had a good pedigree and that was lots of hype about this game before it was released. I have seen GTA evolve from a 2D overhead game engine to this incredible masterpiece. The visuals and gameplay are fantastic and it is very well polished. Rockstar have continued to raise the bar with this episode of GTA. Not one for children - but a classic game for adult gameplayers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Almost four years on and I'm still playing.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how Rockstar will better this! I still play online most days and the constant stream of new content always means there's something else to do. My one gripe is how expensive everything online is and how they actively encourage the purchase of Shark cards to pay for it!
customer_reviews.author: ravejay

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Despite all of the good reviews, I was hesitant about purchasing this game as I found GTA 4 a massive disappointment. However I decided to give it a chance and I am glad that I did, as this is an amazing game. It has all of the qualities that have made previous GTA games, such as Vice City and San Andreas so enjoyable, which I found lacking in GTA 4. So if like me, you found 4 a disappointment, don't let that sway you from purchasing this game. As for the purchase itself, the payment was quick and easy, delivery fast and efficient and the packaging and product where both in excellent condition. Very happy buyer :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Redfern

customer_reviews.title: GTA V for PS3
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived quickly and safely packed. The disc came in its original case and also included the map and instructions which for a used game is exceptional. I had no trouble installing and playing and playing the game and I will be looking to purchase more games from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: May be on par with Vice City
customer_reviews.text: Vice City is my all time GTA, so with San Andreas and GTA IV I was a little disappointed. Don't get me wrong, they were still amazing, but just not quite on the same level! I was also skeptical about how changing the characters would work - no disappointment as I think that could be one of the best features. Only thing I would say is that the missions seemed to be much easier than previous GTA's and I wasn't once tempted to do a cheat or walkthrough. Script is fantastic too.
customer_reviews.author: kemee

customer_reviews.title: Friggin brill
customer_reviews.text: if people criticize this they might as well stop playing computer games. Playing the first hour and have already seen a topless dancer, drove a huge truck into a swimming pool, rode a cable car up a mountain ,raced on a mountain bike.and played tennis .Wonderful graphics.very playable,the attension that has gone into this game is incredible. just buy it, the best ever.
customer_reviews.author: wal red

customer_reviews.title: Good for the veterans of the franchise
customer_reviews.text: Top quality game. If you are a GTA Veteran it has 15 hours playtime on the story and around 100 hours in the online. if you are new to the francise, you will spend so much time in single player you will not bother with the online, it is too difficult for a new player to survive for longer than 10 minutes and that spoils the game, Maybe ranked servers?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed it and I could honestly say I don't get ...
customer_reviews.text: I never used to get the GTA games. I would play them if someone else had them, but was never too interested enough to want to buy for myself. Having played this one though, it was a must have so I went out and got it. Enjoyed it and I could honestly say I don't get bored.
customer_reviews.author: shanelthiggs

customer_reviews.title: Very good game. Tons of content online and offline
customer_reviews.text: Very good game. Tons of content online and offline. Although not as good as San Andreas its definately one of the best in the GTA franchise. Purchase this and you wont be bored!
customer_reviews.author: Jamez Snow

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, engaging, fun game.
customer_reviews.text: What else can be said about this game except that it is truly awesome. Probably the best game I have played on the PS3. Absolutely enthralling, great gameplay, fun characters and storylines. Classic GTA humour. If you enjoyed the rest of the GTA series you will love GTA V. There is so much gameplay here, it will last a really long time - I have been playing (casually) for months and not even 50% completed. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: C Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Best present picker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family member as a gift, it was delivered in a short period of time which was great as it was very close to his birthday and I needed it as soon as possible! Great price :) and he loved it... GET IN! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jodders

customer_reviews.title: GTA V -------best yet----.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the G.T.A games since the first one on PS1 and I can honestly say this is the best. It will take a year if not more to get every achievement or item. My goodness the game play looks fantastic. Being able to play as 3 different characters is an innovation. I wouldn't use multiplayer so the one player game is great.
customer_reviews.author: Davidson

customer_reviews.title: gta v
customer_reviews.text: i pre ordered this game and it came at 9:30 in the morning with the free first class delivery. it took 15 min to install. i started to play it and i was amazed of the game-play it had to be the cheapest and the best i have ever played only for £35. online stalled first 2 days but went to normal operations, the most annoying thing is the 10 year olds raging and screaming in the mic (thank you god for the mute button) over all beats the first person shooters ive played before it and they were all £50. BEST GAME OF THE YEAR
customer_reviews.author: deathydino

customer_reviews.title: "Amazing, beautiful and breathtaking"
customer_reviews.text: Not much needs saying for GTA V, other than its everything you would expect from a 5 year wait. Rockstar make it beautiful and fluid, really pushing the graphical boundaries of the 5th gen console. A stunning story playing as Michael, Franklin and Trevor, this slightly sexist, outrageous masterpiece deserves to be played, re-played and played again.
customer_reviews.author: michaelangelo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Great game, with good missions. You get a sense that they've really worked on the playability and adapted it so that all levels of gamer can complete with practice. It's also interesting that you can now swop between characters and this is generally quite well executed with warnings and such. Graphics are breathtaking and the variety of vehicles is good. My ONLY complaint is that there is one particular mission where I really think they went a bit too far (torture).....
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hibbins

customer_reviews.title: ... GTA4 just lost intrest in the Story this is better it got me back into turning the Console on
customer_reviews.text: Finished this game a few months back it is the most complete game ever to appear on a Playstation i have finished all the GTA`s minus GTA4 just lost intrest in the Story this is better it got me back into turning the Console on! Graphics 10/10 Sound 10/10 Gameplay is 10/10 so much to explore and a Story that could have gone on for ever it was that good
customer_reviews.author: MclarenFanLG

customer_reviews.title: woooow ,woooooow and woooooow ,seriously !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: what the heck maaaaaaan,,,this game is mind blowing ,breath taking and eye catching ,,,it has all the entertainments you ask for in video games ,,story wise is 5 stars hollywood,, graphics and gameplay is just what i call super perfect,a masterpiece,,been playing it for like 3 days and im still at 21% ,though im taking my time and enjoying all the side stuff you can do ,,and im seeing my self spending around 40 hours enjoying the beauty of los santos and the craziness of trevor,michael and franklin ,,,guys just get this game ,you wont regret it and its worth every penny of it ,,,,this is some serious sh$$$$$$$$$$tt ,,hope this help!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game. Be aware that this has an 18 rating for a reason. I know several people that got it for thier kids and then suprised at the content and what can be done within the world of theis game. Great fun and loads to do althouigh sometimes I found it dificult to know what to do to progress the game.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Bob

customer_reviews.title: Fave game
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, did sell to upgrade to ps4 as sadly a lot of updates are only on next gen. However story mode is amazing, and it's not the sellers fault that last gen is being left behind, obviously ps3's aren't very modern anymore and dont hold a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Kamil

customer_reviews.title: Rockstar have done it again.
customer_reviews.text: Rockstar have done it again. Another example of why they are one of the premier game designers today. So much to do in game and so many places to see. You could literally play for hours without ever touching a mission.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh O'Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Superb Game, But Wait
customer_reviews.text: For the love of God, wait for this game to be released for the Xbox One, PS4 and PC. The game has bag loads of potential to be one of the all time best games, as the foundations are very much in place, but the last-gen consoles hold back this potential to the point where it would make far more sense to wait for the current-gen release. Wait, wait, wait.
customer_reviews.author: Haydn

customer_reviews.title: Best version of the GTA series by far
customer_reviews.text: Best version of the GTA series by far, each time rockstar out do themselves, So much fun playing the storyline mode and even when that's done you can play on for hours. Look forward to the newest PS4 release
customer_reviews.author: jamie kressinger

customer_reviews.title: It's just soooo addictive
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of the GTA franchise for years and I can say that this is probably my favourite. Trust me you won't be disappointed as the story keeps you engaged and you can also find many side missions and other things to do. For the price you can't go wrong with this game as there's a little something init for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game
customer_reviews.text: It's GTA.. you need it. I dunno if it's because I'm older now or because games aren't the same, but although I do love this game, it doesn't have the same appeal as I expected. It's San Andreas without the joy that San Andreas gave me.. maybe I'm nostalgic. You need to buy the game though.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This is the largest map of any GTA game so far, but it's not all just dull scenery to while away the time while you get between locations, there's lots to do along the way, hidden gems, mini-games, and a mind blowing array of storyline options. This franchise just gets better and better with every release.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Chapman

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games on the PS3
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic game and represents a massive improvement over GTA IV. The city and surrounding countryside is packed with a variety of things to do and the storyline is the most interesting in the history of GTA in my opinion. Quite frankly this game makes me question why I even need to spend hundreds of pounds on a next-gen console anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Soton1990

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: I've heard people complain about the writing of this game, and about some of the more objectionable content. Personally I have simple tastes, all i want from a GTA game is a sandbox in which I can cause chaos. GTA V performs this role admirably. Also, I find GTA Online immensely fun, as long as I avoid strangers.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good Game but I'm not longer a child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game not long ago, in all honesty I thought I would enjoy it but have clearly matured since the last Grand Theft Auto and found myself increasingly less interested in playing the game and more interested in paying my mortgage. Oh well - you have to mature at some point
customer_reviews.author: Alex Decmar

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Game
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who loved San Andreas on the PS2 will love this game too.....similar map features, awesome details, great story line, online play has yet to be desired but its ok.....but in game play i would recommend keeping all three characters at the end otherwise when they have done all their missions the game is a bit of a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan R

customer_reviews.title: good game awesome features .
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews about the game at gamezblog.net i have dicided to give it a go as ign said 10/10 etc. Great product by rockstar i should say . But very limited story missions. But fun didnt ends there its huge online though . DO the jobs on your own or with friends earn money , spend them buy properties and hang with your friends within them properties .Thats awesome .... WHile robbing local indian stores shout what ever within microphone and you get reaction from them amazing . Withdraw your money to bank so other players dont snatch off from you . mind blowing . SO beside story its great game to have . ROCKSTAR your ROCK.
customer_reviews.author: swiftsaves

customer_reviews.title: Fab game...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game in general. Very addictive. Although now I'm having trouble with the disc I got.. The game has frozen at start menu and will not go any further. I am gutted. Tried everything to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B

customer_reviews.title: Enough said
customer_reviews.text: Game is ok but gave it to someone else that appreciated it more
customer_reviews.author: Strassman612

customer_reviews.title: Lived up to the billing
customer_reviews.text: Having heard the hype about this game and having waited a long time for it, I had hoped this game would be as good as was suggested - I was not let down. Spectacular graphics for a current gen console game, intuitive controls, moderately faithful recreation of Los Santos as many will remember from San Andreas and immersive gameplay. Whilst I feel the amount of swearing in the game is slightly gratuitous, it does not severely hinder the game's story in any way. Very much recommended for any fans of the Gran Theft Auto series, or anyone looking for an almost sandbox-like game that encompasses many different genres in one!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: you dont have to be a hardened veteran of the gta series to like this game
customer_reviews.text: its a very big game with something for everyone - I played the very first grand theft auto game (how ever long ago that was) & haven't bothered with any since - until I saw this & decided to give it a try , and its great - lots of longevity - huge map - lots of options - pleased I bought the strategy guide , which opens the game up even more
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Best GTA to date
customer_reviews.text: Completed it several times, absolutely got my money's worth as there is so much story and detail in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Mr A Tang

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect game i try tell any one thinking about getting this thats they should i like it that muck i got it on 360 too if you would like to play GTA online add me PSN XwarXsteee 360 XwarXsteee just inbox me on them to let me know where you added me from
customer_reviews.author: jessica orton

customer_reviews.title: Gta V
customer_reviews.text: Great Game, immersive world, believable characters and a great storyline if you like: Red dead redemption, hit and running old ladies, starting a university massacre, smoking and dealing illegal substances, burning alive innocent amercan tax payers and stomping on dogs then this is the game for YOU i'm a fan of first-person games like Far cry 3, Dishonored and occasionally Battlefield and i dont like 3rd person games that much but this game is one of the best games i've played. It's very humoristic and the storyline is also one of the best storytelling in the range of games that i've played. so i definitely recommend this game to every gamer, from strategy game players to FPS players.
customer_reviews.author: Sesselja G. Magnusdottir

customer_reviews.title: Not the Game of the Year but Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am going to start saying that i hated GTA IV. I simply didn't liked it. I was trapped in San Andreas and i didnt feel like i was free in Liberty City, the gameplay was too "real". GTA V not only we could call it a technological mastepiece, its just freacking fun. The plot its very funny, i didnt find any boring moment and it is just gigantic. Too gigantic. The city feels alive while the desert its what is suppose to be. Driving has improved a lot, it is fun once again to drive. Everyone that love videogames and action adventure games with RATED 18 content, just fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Costa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game, been playing it for years now, still have a good time.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, been playing it for years now, still have a good time. Initially the game itself was entertaining enough but then the multiplayer was introduced and it revived the enjoyment of the game and made it last long.
customer_reviews.author: Waleed Khan

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is that this is the first GTA game where I've actually wanted to (and have) played the story mode before even contemplating doing any of the insane stuff the game offers. I really disliked the character of Trevor who you pretty much have to play. Other than that, I love this game and need to go explore!
customer_reviews.author: Shaddino

customer_reviews.title: Best game of this console generation
customer_reviews.text: This game is great! The graphics are beautiful, the gameplay is amazingly smooth, the driving and combat is much more fun than in GTA IV. Just like the previous GTA games, the radio stations play good music, the cutscenes and dialogues are funny, witty and very well synchronized. There are virtually no loading times. I cant think of anything I dislike about this game. If you liked the GTA series so far, you will love this game. If you havent tried GTA so far, buy this game! It's the best open world game so far and the best game of this console generation.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great game. I really enjoyed the single player but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game. I really enjoyed the single player but online makes this game brilliant. There is so much to do from flying military aircraft to taking a bike ride in the country. Its a very realistic game which has to be one of the best games to ever be created by rockstar.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Rockstar are the best
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Long and interesting story line. Has unlimited capabilities online. Free monthly updates with more content every time. Well done rockstar, well done.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley N.

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Buy it if you like this sort of game.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. It's a good game. Lot's to do, lots to explore and the graphics are great. The missions are fun and the story line is good. Only a little slow on the loading times on my PS3, but I suspect that is due to loading such a large amount of content, not an issue with the game! I have to say too, don't play this with young eyes and ears about. Almost every other word is an expletive or lewd comment!
customer_reviews.author: WH_Twisting

customer_reviews.title: this is a pretty simple review Have you played this game
customer_reviews.text: this is a pretty simple review Have you played this game? No: go buy it Yes: go play it again Great game, great story. At the time I wanted it to be out for PC but considering that's out now it just makes everything OK in the world again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. While

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wicked good game, I'm seriously addicted. Shame I have to go to work really but what better way to let off some steam after a rubbish day at work. My wifes a GTA V widow like many other unfortunate ladies out their. Packaged well and recieved on time. Thank you to all concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Juelz

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game, very good story line, blows all other games at the time out of the water. Amazed how much detail they've put into the animation and cars and buildings... The list goes on. Delivered on time and brand new, better pricing than on the high Street. If you haven't yet played this game, you're missing out
customer_reviews.author: Max Hunter

customer_reviews.title: If you haven't already, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great game! The graphics are decent, and the gameplay is awesome! I've been playing this game for about 10 months now, and I'm still not bored with it. I can't wait to see where Rockstar go next!
customer_reviews.author: TheStudent (Alex)

customer_reviews.title: Best GTA yet.
customer_reviews.text: It has everything except being able to enter the burger bars... But who wants that when you can fly planes again? After it was gone for no reason in GTA IV. I like that you can control 3 characters, great graphic and controls. I like the story so far (Haven't finished it) Running around with Trevor causing madness is such a joy Its everything I wanted and a little more.. (Diving under water and attacking sharks?!)
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Rockstar just don't disappoint here...
customer_reviews.text: After waiting what seems like an eternity for this game, all that's to be sad is that it was well worth it. GTAV is an amazing game, one of those that all gamers should try in their gamer lifes. The GTA Online component is also a great laugh to play. So yeah, not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Benny26

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my partner, I did try and play it but I'm no good at this type of game, it was fun but a bit difficult for me! He loves it though and has put in many hours on the story and online so it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: A L H

customer_reviews.title: 2013's Best Seller
customer_reviews.text: Rockstar Server Issues aside, this game was worth the wait. It's got everything (short of Snooker) that you'd expect to have from the last games and much, much more. The evolved story mode (centered around three characters) has developed well from the single character mode of the games predecessors, and the (now playable) online mode adds to the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stephens

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: well....I thought skyrim was good,remember that game back in the day,this blows it away.gta 4 was good but lacked in recreational activities and things to spend your hard earned cash on,this has plenty.customization albeit clothes or cars has a fantastic range as does vehicles weapons hobbies locations and the scale is massive id say more but I cant its just brilliant,graphics,gameplay,size,everything its just ace.cancel all appointments and phone in sick you wont be disappointed enjoy
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Griffiths

product_meta.title: Grand Theft Auto V (PS3)
product_meta.description:
Platform:PlayStation 3| Edition:Standard Edition

GRAND THEFT AUTO V
Los Santos: a sprawling sun-soaked metropolis full of self-help gurus, starlets, and fading celebrities, once the envy of the Western world, now struggling to stay afloat in an era of economic uncertainty and cheap reality TV. Amidst the turmoil, three very different criminals plot their own chances of survival and success: Franklin, a former street gangster, now looking for real opportunities and serious money; Michael, a professional ex-con whose retirement is a lot less rosy than he hoped it would be; and Trevor, a violent maniac driven by the next big score. Running out of options, the crew risks everything in a series of daring and dangerous heists that could set them up for life.

The biggest, most dynamic and most diverse open world ever created, Grand Theft Auto V blends storytelling and gameplay in new ways as players repeatedly jump in and out of the lives of the game's three lead characters, playing all sides of the game's interwoven story.

All the classic hallmarks of the groundbreaking series return, including incredible attention to detail and Grand Theft Auto's darkly humorous take on modern culture, alongside a brand new and ambitious approach to open world multiplayer.

Developed by series creators Rockstar North, Grand Theft Auto V will be available worldwide for Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 on September 17.



Blaine County


Our largest open world yet - by far - and spanning vastly diverse cultural and geographical areas, the entire world of Grand Theft Auto V is open from the very beginning of the game to explore. Visitors to the greater metropolis of Los Santos and the countryside of Blaine County will encounter faded celebrities, meth heads, party people, violent gangs, hikers, bikers and every other manner of colorful denizen. You'll be able to traverse everywhere from the tops of the mountains, through the streets of Los Santos and to the depths of the ocean floor.

Michael, Franklin and Trevor


Three playable protagonists - Michael, Franklin and Trevor may live in different parts of town, have their own issues, attitudes, lifestyles, desires and goals - but they do know how to work together. They also each have their own unique skillsets to bring to the table when it's time to get the job done.

Heists

Petty crimes, hustling and stealing cars can only get you so far in Los Santos. To score big, Michael, Franklin and Trevor will work together to pull off grand Heists - big, multi-part missions that require careful preparation, recruiting, and precise (and often explosive) execution. Cash is king in GTAV and while there will be plenty of ways to acquire and spend it - heists are the way to earn the big bucks.

"Recreational Activity"

The open world of Grand Theft Auto V is not just massive in scale, but will offer more to get into than ever before. For recreation, play a bit of golf or tennis, zen out with some yoga or cycle through the countryside... For adrenaline heads, parachute over the city, or customize your Cheetah and take it to the streets to race suckers for money... Or earn cash the old fashioned way, by taking it - whether by ripping off liquor stores or by buying and taking over businesses that will earn you dividends... Even minding your own business having a stroll you may meet one of Los Santos' weirdos, junkies, drunkies, or starlets and find yourself off on a wild misadventure you never expected...
















Install Information






Grand Theft Auto V is the largest and most ambitious game Rockstar Games has yet created, and takes full advantage of every ounce of processing power available in the current generation of consoles. In order to provide the best possible experience for such a massive and detailed world, the game will have installation requirements on the PlayStation 3.

Grand Theft Auto V ships on one disc and will install content as soon as you insert the game. The install is roughly 8GB, and players will be able to play as soon as the install is complete.





BOX CONTAINS
1 x game disc
feature_bullets: enhanced damage and weather effects and much more
